network

Class MsgFileOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Message
      • network.MsgFileOffer

  • public class MsgFileOffer
extends Message

    1B op code: 4
    4B int message id
    4B int transaction id
    4B int request id
    String filename zero-terminated
    String return folder:host:ftpPort if returning result is requested, empty string otherwise zero-terminated
    8B double estimated finish time
    Author:
    Ivan Straka

      • getNodeID

        public int getNodeID()
        Description copied from class: Message
        Used for identification. i.e. in MsgHello message define sender id. Also, this may be used with Message.getTransactionID() for unique command identification.
        Example: nodes A nad B
        A sends MsgFileRequest with A's id-2 and command id-3 to B.
        B sends MsgFileOffer with node id-2 and command id-3 to A.
        A successfuly downloads file and sends MsgAck with nodeID 2 and transactionID 3 to B to end transfering.
        B can map some object to 2=>3=>object to handle transfering.
        Specified by:
        getNodeID in class Message
        Returns:
        node id

      • getTransactionID

        public int getTransactionID()
        Description copied from class: Message
        Used for identification. i.e. in MsgHello message define sender id. Also, this may be used with Message.getTransactionID() for unique transaction identification.
        Example: nodes A nad B
        A sends MsgFileRequest with A's id-2 and command id-3 to B.
        B sends MsgFileOffer with node id-2 and command id-3 to A.
        A successfuly downloads file and sends MsgAck with nodeID 2 and transactionID 3 to B to end transfering.
        B can map some object to 2=>3=>object to handle transfering.
        Specified by:
        getTransactionID in class Message
        Returns:
        node id
